'''Hanna Brandybuck, née Goldworthy''', was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Hanna married [[Madoc Brandybuck]] and was the mother of [[Marmadoc Brandybuck|Marmadoc]].<ref>{{App|Brandybuck}}</ref>
